abstract: The presidential campaign unexpectedly made its way to Afghanistan when Hamid Karzai brought up recent comments by Herman Cain during a meeting with Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton.
snippet: The presidential campaign unexpectedly made its way to Afghanistan when Hamid Karzai brought up recent comments by Herman Cain during a meeting with Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton.

headline.main: Hey Herman Cain, Hamid Karzai Knows Your Name
